lead_paragraph: Democrats are gearing up for their final four workdays before the August recess and their return to their districts, where they will face questions over two dramas, President Obama's health care plan and the sputtering economy.
snippet: Democrats are gearing up for their final four workdays before the August recess, and they will almost certainly face questions about President Obama's health care plan and the sputtering economy.
abstract: Democrats are gearing up for their final four workdays before the August recess, and they will almost certainly face questions about President Obama's health care plan and the sputtering economy.
